muxarchive.Archive items can be found and installed: Aquí es poden trobar els elements d'arxiu - Partides i estats guardats, actualitzacions, temes, etc.

muxassign.This is where you can assign a core or e: Aquí pots assignar un nucli o un emulador extern al contingut.

Arrencant sistema - Un moment, si us plau...
Prem el botó POWER per continuar arrencant…

muxconfig.Change your current date, time, and time: Modifica la data actual, l'hora i la zona horària.
muxconfig.Connect to a Wi-Fi network manually or v: Connecta't a una xarxa Wi-Fi manualment o mitjançant un perfil guardat.
muxconfig.Device specific and muOS frontend settin: Aquí es pot trobar configuració específica del dispositiu i de la interfície de muOS.
muxconfig.Find out what storage device core settin: Find out what storage device core settings and configurations are mounted
muxconfig.Select a muOS supported theme: Selecciona un tema compatible amb muOS.
muxconfig.Toggle a range of configurable services: Activa un ventall de serveis configurables als que pots accedir des de la xarxa.

muxgov.Configure CPU governors to dynamically a: Configura governadors de CPU per ajustar dinàmicament la freqüència de la CPU i ajudar a equilibrar el consum d'energia i rendiment.

muxinfo.Access statistics of played content and: Accedeix a estadístiques de contingut jugat i altres activitats.
muxinfo.Access version information and system de: Accedeix a informació sobre la versió i detalls del sistema.
muxinfo.View all of the current muOS supporters: Veure tots els col·laboradors actuals de muOS.

muxlaunch.Content marked as favourite can be found: Aquí es pot trobar el contingut marcat com a preferit.
muxlaunch.Content on storage devices (SD1/SD2/USB): Aquí es pot trobar el contingut dels dispositius d'emmagatzematge (SD1/SD2/USB).
muxlaunch.Content previously launched can be found: Aquí es pot trobar el contingut jugat anteriorment.
muxlaunch.Various applications can be found and la: Aquí es poden trobar aplicacions diverses.
muxlaunch.Various configurations can be changed he: Aquí es poden modificar configuracions diverses.
muxlaunch.Various information can be found and lau: Aquí es pot trobar informació diversa.

muxnetprofile.No Saved Network Profiles Found: No s'han trobat perfils de xarxa guardats
muxnetprofile.Password must be 8..63 characters!: La contrasenya ha de tenir 8..63 caràcters!
muxnetprofile.Password must be unset or 8..63 characte: Password must be unset or 8..63 characters!
muxnetprofile.Quickly switch between different Wi-Fi c: Alterna ràpidament entre diferents configuracions Wi-Fi basat en la teva localització o preferències de xarxa.

muxnetscan.Detect, display and connect to available: Detecta, mostra i connecta't a xarxes Wi-Fi disponibles.

muxnetwork.Cannot modify while connected!: No es pot modificar mentre estàs connectat!
muxnetwork.Connect to the network using options ent: Connecta't a la xarxa amb les opcions introduïdes a dalt.
muxnetwork.Enter the device IP address here (Static: Introdueix l'adreça IP del dispositiu aquí.
muxnetwork.Enter the device Subnet (CIDR) number he: Introdueix el número de subxarxa (CIDR) del dispositiu aquí.
muxnetwork.Enter the network gateway address here (: Introdueix la porta d'enllaç aquí. (Només per Estàtic)
muxnetwork.Enter the network identifier (SSID) here: Introdueix l'identificador de la xarxa (SSID) aquí.
muxnetwork.Enter the network password here: Introdueix la contrasenya de la xarxa aquí.
muxnetwork.Please check network settings: Si us plau, revisa la configuració de xarxa
muxnetwork.Toggle between DHCP and Static network t: Alterna entre tipus de xarxa DHCP i Estàtic.
muxnetwork.Toggle the Wi-Fi network on and off: Activa o desactiva la xarxa Wi-Fi.

muxoption.Search for content within the selected d: Search for content within the selected directory
muxoption.Set the CPU governor for the selected co: Assigna el governador de CPU pel contingut o directori seleccionat.
muxoption.Set the system core or external emulator: Assigna el nucli de sistema o emulador extern pel contingut o directori seleccionat.

muxplore.Could not load content - No core is asso: No s'ha pogut carregar el contingut - No hi ha cap nucli associat
muxplore.Could not load content!: No s'ha pogut carregar el contingut!
muxplore.Directories cannot be added to Favourite: No es poden afegir directoris a Preferits

muxpower.Configure how the power button functions: Configura com funciona el botó POWER en mantenir-lo premut (2 segons).
muxpower.Configure the time the device will sleep: Configura el temps d'espera per a que el dispositiu es suspengui en no prémer cap tecla.
muxpower.Configure the time the screen will dim w: Configura el temps d'espera per a que la pantalla s'enfosqueixi en no prémer cap tecla.
muxpower.Configure when the red LED will display: Configura l'encesa del LED vermell segons el percentatge de bateria actual.

muxrtc.Change your current date, time, and time: Canvia la data actual, l'hora i la zona horària.

muxsearch.Enter in the name of the content you are: Enter in the name of the content you are looking for
muxsearch.Lookup has to be 3 characters or more!: Lookup has to be 3 characters or more!
muxsearch.Search all current active storage device: Search all current active storage devices
muxsearch.Search within the current selected folde: Search within the current selected folder and folders within

muxstorage.Location of assigned core and governor c: Location of assigned core and governor configurations
muxstorage.Location of content images and text: Location of content images and text
muxstorage.Location of save states and files: Location of save states and files
muxstorage.This storage element is already on SD2: This storage element is already on SD2

muxsysinfo.The current CPU frequency of the device: The current CPU frequency of the device
muxsysinfo.The current detected temperature of the: The current detected temperature of the device
muxsysinfo.The current device type detected and con: The current device type detected and configured
muxsysinfo.The current running governor of the devi: The current running governor of the device
muxsysinfo.The current running time of the system: The current running time of the system
muxsysinfo.The current version of muOS running on t: The current version of muOS running on the device
muxsysinfo.The current, and total, memory usage of: The current, and total, memory usage of the device
muxsysinfo.The detected CPU type of the device: The detected CPU type of the device
muxsysinfo.The number of processes currently runnin: The number of processes currently running on the system

muxtester.Press POWER to finish testing: Prem el botó POWER per finalitzar la prova
muxtester.Press any button to start input testing!: Prem qualsevol botó per començar la prova d'entrada!

muxtheme.This theme has no attributed credits!: Aquest tema no té crèdits atribuïts!

muxtimezone.Select your preferred timezone: Tria la teva zona horària de preferència.

muxtweakadv.Adjust the rate of speed when holding na: Ajusta la velocitat quan es mantenen premudes les tecles de navegació.
muxtweakadv.Change how the device buttons work globa: Canvia com funcionen globalment els botons del dispositiu.
muxtweakadv.Change how the font type works in the fr: Change how the font type works in the frontend - 'Theme' will ensure frontend will use fonts within themes with a fallback to language fonts - 'Language' will specifically use language based font
muxtweakadv.Change the default audio level that the: Change the default audio level that the device will use each time it starts up
muxtweakadv.Change the default brightness level that: Change the default brightness level that the device will use each time it starts up
muxtweakadv.Change the default theme used for the ne: Change the default theme used for the next device launch
muxtweakadv.Change the displayed battery percentage: Change the displayed battery percentage to improve accuracy based on calibration or known deviations in the battery capacity reading
muxtweakadv.Interface Font Type: Tipus de font de la interfície
muxtweakadv.Switch between device speaker or externa: Switch between device speaker or external monitor audio via HDMI connection
muxtweakadv.Switch between system sleep suspend stat: Switch between system sleep suspend states
muxtweakadv.Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch unti: Toggle a delayed start of RetroArch until a network connection is established
muxtweakadv.Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functiona: Toggle between ADB and MTP USB functionality
muxtweakadv.Toggle startup and shutdown verbose mess: Toggle startup and shutdown verbose messages used for debugging faults
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the power bu: Toggle the functionality of the power button to switch DPAD mode
muxtweakadv.Toggle the functionality of the user ini: Toggle the functionality of the user initialisation scripts on device startup
muxtweakadv.Toggle the passcode lock - More informat: Toggle the passcode lock - More information can be found on the muOS website
muxtweakadv.Toggle the power LED during content laun: Toggle the power LED during content launch
muxtweakadv.Toggle the system ability to automatical: Activa l'habilitat del sistema per apagar automàticament el dispositiu quan detecta temperatures altes.
muxtweakadv.Toggle vibration for device startup, sle: Toggle vibration for device startup, sleep, and shutdown

muxtweakgen.Change the brightness of the device to a: Change the brightness of the device to a specific level
muxtweakgen.Change the colour temperature of the dis: Change the colour temperature of the display if the device supports it
muxtweakgen.Change where the device will start up in: Change where the device will start up into
muxtweakgen.Settings that should only be changed by: Opcions que només haurien de ser modificades per aquells que saben el que es fan!
muxtweakgen.Settings to change the power features of: Settings to change the power features of the device
muxtweakgen.Settings to change the visual aspects of: Settings to change the visual aspects of the frontend
muxtweakgen.Toggle hidden content displayed in Explo: Toggle hidden content displayed in Explore Content - Place a '.' or '_' character at the start of a file or folder name to hide it
muxtweakgen.Toggle the HDMI output to a specific res: Toggle the HDMI output to a specific resolution and frequency
muxtweakgen.Toggle the background music of the front: Toggle the background music of the frontend - This will stop if content is launched
muxtweakgen.Toggle the navigation sound of the front: Toggle the navigation sound of the frontend if the current theme supports it

muxvisual.Change the display priority of the conte: Change the display priority of the content images
muxvisual.Change the screen alignment of the conte: Change the screen alignment of the content images
muxvisual.Changes the top title label in Explore C: Changes the top title label in Explore Content to show current storage device along with folder name
muxvisual.Content Box Art: Art de la coberta del contingut
muxvisual.Content Dash Replacement: Reemplaçament de guions en noms de contingut
muxvisual.Menu Counter File: Comptador d'elements a arxius del menú
muxvisual.Menu Counter Folder: Comptador d'elements a carpetes del menú
muxvisual.Rearranges the label of content to move: Rearranges the label of content to move the 'The' label to the front - For example, 'Batman and Robin, The' to 'The Batman and Robin'
muxvisual.Remove extra information from content la: Remove extra information from content labels - This does NOT rename your files it only changes how it is displayed
muxvisual.Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) f: Replaces the dash (-) with a colon (:) for content labels
muxvisual.Replaces the label of shortened content: Replaces the label of shortened content folders to more appropriately named labels
muxvisual.Toggle the background animation of the c: Toggle the background animation of the current selected theme
muxvisual.Toggle the fade to black animation on co: Toggle the fade to black animation on content launching
muxvisual.Toggle the splash image on content launc: Toggle the splash image on content launching
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of currently selec: Toggle the visibility of currently selected file along with total in Explore Content
Toggle the visibility of currently selected folder along with total in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of empty folders i: Toggle the visibility of empty folders in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the battery gly: Toggle the visibility of the battery glyph
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth g: Toggle the visibility of the bluetooth glyph
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the clock: Toggle the visibility of the clock
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the item count: Toggle the visibility of the item count within folders in Explore Content
muxvisual.Toggle the visibility of the network gly: Toggle the visibility of the network glyph

muxwebserv.Toggle Resilio - WebUI can be found on p: Activar Resilio - La WebUI es pot trobar al port 6060
muxwebserv.Toggle SFTP support - WebUI can be found: Activar suport per SFTP - La WebUI es pot trobar al port 9090
muxwebserv.Toggle SSH support - Access via port 22: Activar suport per SSH - S'accedeix pel port 22
muxwebserv.Toggle Syncthing - WebUI can be found on: Activar Syncthing - La WebUI es pot trobar al port 7070
muxwebserv.Toggle Tailscale - Need to login via SSH: Toggle Tailscale - Need to login via SSH first
muxwebserv.Toggle network time protocol for active: Toggle network time protocol for active network connections
muxwebserv.Toggle virtual terminal - WebUI can be f: Activa la terminal virtual - La WebUI es pot trobar al port 8080
